city.name: Paris
city.description: The most romantic city in the world, Paris is a global center for art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture. Paris returns to tranquillity in the autumn and when winter and the holidays arrive, Paris' streets are illuminated, revealing the city's magic.

favouriteSubjects.name: Business Intelligence
favouriteSubjects.description: Business Intelligence because it empowers you to transform raw data into actionable insights, driving strategic decisions and business growth. I relish the challenge of analyzing trends, discovering patterns, and providing data-driven recommendations. This role allows you to blend analytical skills with strategic thinking, making a tangible impact on your organization.

favouriteSubjects.name: Electronic Records
favouriteSubjects.description: I love Electronic Records Management because it enables you to organize, secure, and streamline access to critical information, enhancing efficiency and compliance. I appreciate the precision and structure it brings to managing data, reducing clutter and ensuring accurate record-keeping. This role allows you to contribute to the smooth functioning of your organization, safeguarding valuable information and supporting informed decision-making.

favouriteSubjects.name: Competitive Intelligence
favouriteSubjects.description: Competitive intelligence, sometimes referred to as corporate intelligence, refers to the ability to gather, analyze, and use information collected on competitors, customers, and other market factors that contribute to a business's competitive advantage.
